short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: SUPER is a crypto wallet designed to seamlessly connect a billion users to the crypto world safely and securely.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
​Non-custodial, multichain, portal to ​decentralized finance and SUPER app.

​The simplest and most secure way to work with digital assets.

Keeps everything in one place

- Use multiple chains with one wallet. No manually switching networks.
- Staking, Restaking, liquid pools, dual investment.
- Monitor all activity with detailed transaction history and notifications.
- No limits on tokens, balances, or transactions.
- Easily send hundreds of tokens in blockchain ecosystems, and carry out cross-chain transfers in seconds.
- Get started or simply top up your balance with our fiat on-ramp providers.
- ​Next gen crypto social network and content monetization platform. ​Messenger.
- Research & reporting using real-time on-chain data & analytics, predict future market movements, ​see what top traders/investors are doing in real time, track wallets and your portfolio, etc.
- Card. ​Spend crypto instantly & globally.
- Cryptocurrency market overview, news, events, ideas.
- Swap tokens super fast and at low fees.
- Store, stake, and earn rewards with your tokens.
- Easily list your NFTs on NFT marketplaces directly from super.
- Purchase crypto from over 7 sources including card and bank transfer.
- As a self-custodial wallet, you have full control of your funds. We never have access.
- Private by design. No name, email, or phone number required.
- Scam detection flags malicious transactions instantly.
- Connect your Ledger for added security.
- Our global support team are here for you 24/7. Multiple languages supported.

Be super! Install super.
